an5.113:1.1: “Bhikkhus, endowed with five qualities, a bhikkhu cannot abide having entered upon right composure.
an5.113:1.3: It’s when a bhikkhu can’t endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
an5.113:1.4: Endowed with these five qualities, a bhikkhu cannot abide having entered upon right composure.
an5.113:2.1: Endowed with five qualities, a bhikkhu can abide having entered upon right composure.
an5.113:2.3: It’s when a bhikkhu can endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
an5.113:2.4: Endowed with these five qualities, a bhikkhu can abide having entered upon right composure.”
